ygData.subject: RE: Castle Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: i have also done the maid/butler combo to get my 2 wakis (now rusting cause of my two yaks, wish they weren t no drop) with only myself and a level 50 druid.
ygData.messageBody:
i have also done the maid/butler combo to get my 2 wakis (now rusting cause
of my two yaks, wish they weren't no drop) with only myself and a level 50
druid. the trick is to stagger the spawn and pull singles when you can.
since everything is green at 50, if you can invis to a good pulling spot (we
just hung in the butler's room the whole time) then you can pull one at a
time by using a long range spell. stagger them out and fight one at a time
for hours. as far as taking the whole castle i have not tried and wouldn't
want to =) a level 40-45 group with a GGer could handle it if they were
slow and smart. when i tried the ballroom in my mid 30s, high 30s, and low
40s i died all 3 times in full groups.

Shada

> From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
> >Actually i can go in and solo the maid, butler, princess,
> >etc no problem.
>
> wow.. I need your secrets <g>
>
> >There is no one single trick to mistmoore...
>
> =(
>
> >That being said, a full party of lvl 40-50's can get decimated
> >in mistmoore in no time flat. You pull a couple of harm touching
> >mobs (who knew cooks could harm touch!?!) and you wont even make
> >it into melee range.
>
> Ouch. That just hurts hearing that. What is the typical monster/
> level breakdown inside the castle?
>
> Ok, so it's doable. How do I convince a L40-45 group that it's
> reasonably safe to venture in? hehe. Just too many horror
> stories out there.
>
> Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
> League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
> < Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
